law.catch_line: In this section, "regulated counselor or therapist" means:...

text.section:
Unless the Board agrees to accept the surrender of a license or certificate, while the licensee or certificate holder is under investigation or while charges are pending against the licensee or certificate holder, a regulated counselor or therapist may not:
Surrender the license or certificate; or
Allow the license or certificate to lapse by operation of law.
The Board may set conditions on its agreement with the regulated counselor or therapist under investigation or against whom charges are pending to accept surrender of the license or certificate.
